import React, {useState} from 'react' import {BsArrowRight} from 'react-icons/bs' import {BsSnow} from 'react-icons/bs' import {TbTruck,TbTruckOff} from 'react-icons/tb' import './products.css' import SingleProductInfo from './SingleProductInfo' const ProductCard = ({ product }) => { const stockAmmount = product.acf.stockammount const category = product.acf.category const [showDialog, setShowDialog] = useState(false); return ( <>
setShowDialog(true)} className='product-card-container'>
{category === "frost" ?

Frost

: null } {stockAmmount < 0 ?

På lager

:

Ikke på lager

}

{product.acf.producttitle}

{product.acf.price}kr.

{product.acf.description}

) } export default ProductCard
